content.description: Sit start in a good crack feature on the backside of the boulder that the main Area 51 boulder is sitting on. Work left up into a good jug shelf and grab the top to top out from there.
content.location: Sit starts on the backside of the smaller boulder that the main Area 51 boulder is laying on. This side faces Crash Site.

content.description: Sit start in the same crack that Sweet Potato starts in around the backside of the smaller boulder that the main Area 51 boulder is laying on. Work up the crack to the top.
content.location: Sit starts on the backside of the smaller boulder that Area 51 one is laying on. This side faces Crash Site.

content.description: Sit start down in the cave on a decent edge. Get a good left foot and make a huge move out left to a sharp crack jug. Slowly bring your feet over left to prevent barn-dooring and then bring a right hand over the lip to a sloper pinch and a left hand high up into a good crack jug. Slap the top with high feet from there.
content.location: Sit starts down in the cave on the side of Area 51 facing downhill on an obvious edge. Goes left and then straight up.

content.description: Sit start low below the rail that Spaceman Borg and One Small Step start on in decent crack crimps. Get awkward feet and make an extremely difficult move to the normal start-rail, and then finish as for One Small Step.
content.location: Starts low in crack crimps below the start for One Small Step and Spaceman Borg. Climbs into One Small Step.

content.description: Start on the edge that Spaceman Borg starts on in the cave of Area 51. Go straight up from the edge to two opposing crimps instead of going out left as Spaceman Borg does. From the crimps, slap over the lip to a good sloper and top out on good holds. Extremely fun and pretty line.
content.location: Starts on the side of Area 51 (the cave) facing away from Crash Site on the rail that Spaceman Borg starts on.

content.description: Stand start four feet to the right of Intergalactic Journey in good crack jugs and proceed straight up the vertical face to the top.
content.location: Stand start four feet to the right of Intergalactic Journey in horizontal crack jugs.

content.description: Sit start on the other side of the boulder (opposite of Spaceman Borg) in the cave and work up into a crack that goes out onto the face. Work the crack over right onto the face and then up left. Top out slightly to the right of the Yellow Birch tree on bad slopers. Make sure you have a spotter for this one - it's high!
content.location: Sit starts on the backside of the Area 51 boulder in the cave and continues onto the face, then up.

content.description: Stand start to the right of the sit starts for Squash and Sweet Potato on a good edge and then go straight for the top.
content.location: This stand start is around the backside of the smaller boulder that the main Area 51 boulder is laying on. This side faces Crash Site.

content.description: Stand start on a good jug to the right of Meteor Shower and go straight up the vertical face on thin holds.
content.location: Stand starts about two feet to the right of Meteor Shower on the backside of the Area 51 boulder.

content.description: Sit start to the Left of Spaceman Borg with your left hand in a good undercling below the crack jug used on Spaceman Borg. Make a hard move up to the crack jug with your right hand and finish as for Spaceman Borg.
content.location: Sit starts three feet to the left of Spaceman Borg.

content.description: A large boulder leaning over onto another creating a large cave underneath with potential for hard problems.
